jobs.name: Cowboy/Cowgirl
jobs.description: Responsible for herding cattle on ranches, driving cattle to market, and general ranch work.
jobs.work_message: Spent the day wrangling cattle on the ranch and earned ${{income}}.

jobs.name: Sheriff
jobs.description: Elected law enforcement officer responsible for maintaining order, enforcing laws, and apprehending criminals.
jobs.work_message: Kept the town safe and brought justice to its citizens, earning ${{income}}.

jobs.name: Outlaw
jobs.description: A criminal who engaged in activities such as robbery, cattle rustling, and horse theft.
jobs.work_message: Pulled off a successful heist and pocketed ${{income}}.

jobs.name: Saloon Owner/Bartender
jobs.description: Operated saloons where cowboys and other patrons could drink, socialize, and sometimes gamble.
jobs.work_message: Worked the bar, serving drinks and engaging with customers, making ${{income}} in tips.

jobs.name: Blacksmith
jobs.description: Crafted and repaired metal items, including horseshoes, tools, and wagon parts.
jobs.work_message: Put in a hard day's work at the forge, earning ${{income}}.

jobs.name: Stagecoach Driver
jobs.description: Operated horse-drawn stagecoaches to transport passengers and mail between towns.
jobs.work_message: Navigated treacherous terrain and delivered passengers safely, earning ${{income}}.

jobs.name: Miner
jobs.description: Extracted minerals, such as gold, silver, and copper, from mines in search of wealth.
jobs.work_message: Dug deep into the earth for precious minerals, earning ${{income}}.

jobs.name: Gambler
jobs.description: Played various games of chance, such as poker and faro, in saloons and gambling halls.
jobs.work_message: Took risks at the poker table and walked away with ${{income}} in winnings.

jobs.name: Prostitute
jobs.description: Worked in brothels or as independent 'soiled doves,' providing companionship and sexual services to customers.
jobs.work_message: Provided companionship and pleasure to clients, earning ${{income}}.

jobs.name: Rancher
jobs.description: Owned and managed large tracts of land where cattle and other livestock were raised.
jobs.work_message: Managed the ranch operations and oversaw the herd, making ${{income}} in profits.

jobs.name: Doctor/Surgeon
jobs.description: Provided medical care and performed surgeries, often under primitive conditions.
jobs.work_message: Performed life-saving surgeries and treated patients, earning ${{income}} in fees.

jobs.name: Undertaker
jobs.description: Prepared bodies for burial and organized funeral services.
jobs.work_message: Handled funeral arrangements with care and dignity, earning ${{income}}.

jobs.name: Teacher/Schoolmarm
jobs.description: Educated children in one-room schoolhouses, teaching reading, writing, and arithmetic.
jobs.work_message: Taught young minds and imparted knowledge, earning ${{income}} in wages.

jobs.name: Pony Express Rider
jobs.description: Carried mail across long distances on horseback, often at great speed.
jobs.work_message: Braved dangerous trails and delivered mail swiftly, earning ${{income}}.

jobs.name: Railroad Worker
jobs.description: Constructed and maintained railroads, bridges, and other infrastructure vital for transportation and commerce.
jobs.work_message: Laid tracks and maintained the railway, earning ${{income}}.
